Title: Winter's Bone

Country: USA 
USA release: 11/06/2010 
Released in Spain: 11/02/2011

Genre: Drama 
Length: 100 min 
Director: Debra Granik 
Writer: Debra Granik, Anne Rosellini, Daniel Woodrell 
Starring: Jennifer Lawrence, Isaiah Stone, Ashlee Thompson, Valerie Richards, Shelley Waggener, Garret Dillahunt 


Synopsis: 
The 17-year-old Ree Dolly (Jennifer Lawrence) embarks on a desperate search for his father, who disappeared after putting the money from the family home to pay his bail. If he fails, lost her house and she and her family will be returned to the Ozark forest. Defying the code of silence and threats and risking his life to save yours, Ree Dolly discover that between what he sees and hears the truth lies not Want You to Know. 

Production notes: 
Based on the novel by Daniel Woodrell, Winter's Bone began his stellar run at Sundance where he emerged as winner, has visited the festival in the world and arrive at the Oscars with a bag over 30 international awards, 7 nominations for the Spirit Awards and having gone through the Golden Globes
